00026 #ifndef H_CTAPI
00027 #define H_CTAPI
00028 
00029 #include <types.h>
00030 
00031 #define CTAPI_AD_ICC1           0
00032 #define CTAPI_AD_CT             1
00033 #define CTAPI_AD_HOST           2
00034 
00035 #define CTAPI_RV_OK                0
00036 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_INVALID      -1
00037 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_CT           -8
00038 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_TRANS       -10
00039 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_MEMORY      -11
00040 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_HOST       -127
00041 #define CTAPI_RV_ERR_HTSI       -128
00042 
00043 #define CTAPI_PORT              1
00044 
00045 #define CTAPI_CLA               0x20
00046 #define CTAPI_INS_RESET_CT      0x11
00047 #define CTAPI_INS_REQUEST_ICC   0x12
00048 #define CTAPI_INS_GET_STATUS    0x13
00049 #define CTAPI_INS_EJECT_ICC     0x14
00050 #define CTAPI_INS_EEPROM        0xE0
00051 
00052 typedef unsigned char   IU8;
00053 typedef signed char     IS8;
00054 typedef unsigned short  IU16;
00055 typedef signed short    IS16;
00056 typedef unsigned long   IU32;
00057 typedef signed long     IS32;
00058 
00059 extern int      fd_fromCard[2], fd_toCard[2];
00060 extern int      loadEepromFile;
00061 extern int      saveEepromFile;
00062 extern char     eepromFile[256];
00063 extern int      fdEepromFile;
